4317500.name: Cat in Temple
4317500.description:
Story

On a quiet night, a lone cat wanders into an old temple and suddenly finds itself unable to leave. The same night repeats over and over, trapping the cat in an endless loop. Within the temple grounds, time twists unnaturally, and strange yokai and eerie anomalies appear and vanish like shadows. The cat must explore the ever‑changing paths of the temple, searching for an exit as it continues to wander through the distorted night.

Game Description

This is an exploration game where the player loops through the same map while searching for anomalies.

On the first loop, the correct path will always appear.

From the second loop onward, either an anomaly path or the correct path will appear.

• If an anomaly is present, the player must turn back.

• If the correct path appears, the player can proceed forward.

Successfully choosing the correct path 10 times in a row will clear the game.

If the player makes a mistake at any point, the count resets to zero and the challenge begins again.
